title: A proclamation, discharging the payment of the rents of the bishopricks to any, but the persons named by the council
author: Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
publisher: printed at Edinburgh, and re-printed at London by G. Croom for Thomas Watson,
notes: Originally published: Edinburgh : Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, 1689.
Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall Library, London.
